Text: Thank you for this murdoc47. I can only recognize a 2ch audio stream with KMPlayer & VLC also this is a 1080i HDTV rip with the channels watermark visible in the bottom right hand corner throughout the movie.

the audio is AC3 5.1 surround, VLC player recognizes is. if not, try the settings in your audio driver (if you have a 5.1 system and if it is set as such).
the watermark is indeed visible, i hope it's not a big deal. it's a great movie!
it is AC3 5.1 surround sound. check your settings.
the blu-ray will be released on aug 30, 2011.
